data.eml:eml: Re-examination of the crab spider species Oxytate minuta Tang, Yin et Peng, 2005 (Araneae: Thomisidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jin, Chi, Zhang, Feng (2012): Re-examination of the crab spider species Oxytate minuta Tang, Yin et Peng, 2005 (Araneae: Thomisidae). Zootaxa 3588: 64-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.283157
